data_description.name: A descriptive and unique name for this Shadow Control (SC) instance
data_description.target_cover_entity: Cover which should be handled by this Shadow Control (SC) instance

facade_settings.title: Facade configuration
facade_settings.description: Configure the details of the facade (or even the window), which should be handled by this SC instance

data_description.facade_azimuth_static: Azimuth of the facade in degrees in direction from the inside to the outside. Valid range: 0° to 359°
data_description.facade_offset_sun_in_static: Angle from which the facade in comparison to the given azimuth, will be illuminated. Valid range: -90° to 0°
data_description.facade_offset_sun_out_static: Angle up to which the facade in comparison to the given azimuth, will be illuminated. Valid range: 0° to 90°
data_description.facade_elevation_sun_min_static: Min elevation of the sun, from which the facade will be illuminated. Valid range: 0° to 90°
data_description.facade_elevation_sun_max_static: Max elevation of the sun, up to which the facade will be illuminated. Valid range: 0° to 90°
data_description.facade_slat_width_static: Width of shutter slats in mm.
data_description.facade_slat_distance_static: Distance between shutter slats in mm.
data_description.facade_slat_angle_offset_static: Shutter angle offset in %, which will be added to the computed angle in case a correction is required. Default: 0
data_description.facade_slat_min_angle_static: Min shadow slat angle. Slat position will be in the range of this value and 100%. Default: 0
data_description.facade_shutter_stepping_height_static: Stepping of height positioning in % to prevent small steps, which could not be positioned by the used shutter. Default: 5
data_description.facade_shutter_stepping_angle_static: Stepping of angle positioning in % to prevent small steps, which could not be positioned by the used shutter. Default: 5
data_description.facade_light_strip_width_static: Width of light strip on the floor.
data_description.facade_shutter_height_static: Overall height of window or door. Required to calculate light strip width from previous configuration option.
data_description.facade_neutral_pos_height_static: Height of shutter in neutral position.
data_description.facade_neutral_pos_angle_static: Angle of shutter in neutral position.
data_description.facade_modification_tolerance_height_sta: Tolerance within no height modification will be performed.
data_description.facade_modification_tolerance_angle_stat: Tolerance within no slat angle modification will performed.

dynamic_inputs.title: Dynamic inputs
dynamic_inputs.description: Configure the dynamic inputs, which will be required to automate the given cover

data_description.brightness: Current brightness, usually from a weather station
data_description.brightness_dawn: Brightness at dawn, usually as a the median from multiple brightness sensors.
data_description.sun_elevation: Elevation of the sun, usually from sun entity or a weather station.
data_description.sun_azimuth: Azimuth of the sun, usually from sun entity or a weather station.
data_description.shutter_current_height: Current shutter height as the returned value from the used actor.
data_description.shutter_current_angle: Current shutter angle as the returned value from the used actor.
data_description.lock_integration: Lock the whole integration to prevent any shutter position modification.
data_description.lock_integration_with_position: Lock the whole integration by moving the shutter to a dedicated position.
data_description.movement_restriction_height: Restrict height positioning to prevent redundant shutter movements e. g. between shadow and dawn.
data_description.movement_restriction_angle: Restrict angle positioning to prevent redundant shutter movements e. g. between shadow and dawn.

data_description.shadow_brightness_threshold: Brightness threshold which must be passed to start shadow handling.
data_description.shadow_after_seconds: Time in seconds to close shutter after passing brightness threshold.
data_description.shadow_shutter_max_height: Shutter max height at shadow position.
data_description.shadow_shutter_max_angle: Shutter max slat angle at shadow position.
data_description.shadow_shutter_look_through_seconds: Time to look through position in seconds after brightness threshold was undercut.
data_description.shadow_shutter_open_seconds: Time to open the shutter after look through position
